newsitem.title: ESTONIA: UHIS RUSSIA LEASING ARM GETS LICENCE.
newsitem.headline: UHIS RUSSIA LEASING ARM GETS LICENCE.

text.p: Uhispank's Russian leasing subsidiary has been issued a two-year licence to operate in St Petersburg, Uhisliising said on Wednesday.
In a statement, Uhispank said its year-end forecast for the Russia leasing firm was for a leasing portfolio volume worth 200 million kroons.
Russia Uhisliising is 75 percent owned by Uhispank and 25 percent owned by a Petersburg company, Neva Rus.
Russia Uhisliising's managing director Andrei Haponen said in statement that the company will be following a conservative plan, despite a market with a big future.
He added that his firm did not wish to take big risks.
